title: HumanCohortTemplate
description: Data of biosamples from human patients. Adapted from Table 2 of http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HUL.InstRepos:32725809. This template should be used when biosamples are from NF patients to provides a more valuable characterization and make additional gene-phenotype insights possible.

GIST.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST).
GIST.title: PresenceEnum

IrisLischNodules.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Iris Lisch Nodules.
IrisLischNodules.title: Iris Lisch nodules

MPNSTCharacterization.description: Characterization of the manifestation of MPNST.
MPNSTCharacterization.title: MPNST Characterization

WHOPerformanceStatus.description: Score on the WHO scale describing patient's functional abilities.
WHOPerformanceStatus.title: WHO performance status

age.description: A numeric value representing age of the individual. Use with `ageUnit`.

ageUnit.description: A time unit that can be used with a given age value, e.g. years.
ageUnit.title: TimeUnit

aqueductalStenosis.description: Characterization of the manifestation of aqueductal stenosis.
aqueductalStenosis.title: Aqueductal stenosis

attentionDeficitDisorder.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Attention Deficit Disorder.
attentionDeficitDisorder.title: Attention deficit disorder

breastCancer.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Breast cancer.
breastCancer.title: Breast cancer

dermalNeurofibromas.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Dermal neurofibromas.
dermalNeurofibromas.title: Dermal neurofibromas

dermalSchwannoma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Dermal schwannoma.
dermalSchwannoma.title: Dermal schwannoma

diagnosis.description: Diagnosis for the individual given signs and symptoms. Use the most specific diagnosis term that applies.
diagnosis.title: DiagnosisEnum

diagnosisAgeGroup.description: Age group of the individual at the time of diagnosis.
diagnosisAgeGroup.title: Diagnosis age group

diffuseDermalNeurofibromas.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Diffuse dermal neurofibromas.
diffuseDermalNeurofibromas.title: Diffuse dermal neurofibromas

germlineMutationIndicator.description: Indicates a summary testing result for individual's germline mutation only.
germlineMutationIndicator.title: TestSummaryEnum

gliomaOrEpendymoma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Glioma or ependymoma.
gliomaOrEpendymoma.title: Glioma or ependymoma

glomusTumor.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Glomus tumor.
glomusTumor.title: Glomus tumor

heartDefect.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Heart defect.
heartDefect.title: Heart defect

individualID.description: A unique identifier (non-PII) that represents the individual from which the data came. This could be a patient or animal ID.

inheritance.description: Describes whether known inheritance from a parent.
inheritance.title: Inheritance

intellectualDisability.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Intellectual disability.
intellectualDisability.title: Intellectual disability

learningDisability.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Learning disability.
learningDisability.title: Learning disability

lenticularOpacity.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Lenticular opacity.
lenticularOpacity.title: Lenticular opacity

leukemia.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Leukemia.
leukemia.title: Leukemia

longBoneDysplasia.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Long bone dysplasia.
longBoneDysplasia.title: Long bone dysplasia

meningioma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Meningioma.
meningioma.title: Meningioma

nf1Genotype.description: Genotype of NF1 gene in the biospecimen from which the data were derived, if known.

nf2Genotype.description: Genotype of NF2 gene in the biospecimen from which the data were derived, if known

nonopticGlioma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Nonoptic glioma.
nonopticGlioma.title: Nonoptic glioma

nonvestibularCranialSchwannoma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Nonvestibular cranial schwannoma.
nonvestibularCranialSchwannoma.title: Nonvestibular cranial schwannoma

nonvestibularSchwannomas.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Nonvestibular schwannomas.
enum: 2 or more, at least 1 pathogically confirmed
nonvestibularSchwannomas.title: Nonvestibular schwannomas

opticGlioma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Optic glioma.
opticGlioma.title: Optic glioma

otherTumors.description: Characterization of the manifestation of other tumors.
otherTumors.title: Other tumors

peripheralNeuropathy.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Peripheral neuropathy.
peripheralNeuropathy.title: Peripheral neuropathy

pheochromocytoma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Pheochromocytoma.
pheochromocytoma.title: Pheochromocytoma

plexiformNeurofibromas.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Plexiform neurofibromas.
plexiformNeurofibromas.title: Plexiform neurofibromas

scoliosis.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Scoliosis.
scoliosis.title: Scoliosis

sex.description: Phenotypic expression of chromosomal makeup that defines a study subject as male, female, or other.

species.description: The name of a species (typically a taxonomic group) of organism.
species.title: SpeciesEnum

sphenoidDysplasia.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Sphenoid dysplasia.
sphenoidDysplasia.title: Sphenoid dysplasia

spinalNeurofibromas.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Spinal neurofibromas.
spinalNeurofibromas.title: Spinal neurofibromas

spinalSchwannoma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Spinal schwannoma.
spinalSchwannoma.title: Spinal schwannoma

subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Subcutaneous nodular neurofibromas.
subcutaneousNodularNeurofibromas.title: Subcutaneous nodular neurofibromas

tumorTreatmentStatus.description: Tumor treatment status for the individual.
tumorTreatmentStatus.title: Tumor treatment status

vascularDisease.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Vascular disease.
vascularDisease.title: Vascular disease

vestibularSchwannoma.description: Characterization of the manifestation of Vestibular schwannoma.
vestibularSchwannoma.title: Vestibular schwannoma

BinaryImagingDiagnosisEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging with mainly absent or present being the most relevant result.
BinaryImagingDiagnosisEnum.title: BinaryImagingDiagnosisEnum

LateralManifestationEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging (MRI or other), where lateral information is most relevant.
LateralManifestationEnum.title: LateralManifestationEnum

MultipleImagingDiagnosisEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of tumors confirmed via imaging with one or multiple sites being the most relevant result.
MultipleImagingDiagnosisEnum.title: MultipleImagingDiagnosisEnum

NeurofibromaManifestationEnum.description: Enumerations describing how neurofibromas can manifest more generally.
NeurofibromaManifestationEnum.title: NeurofibromaManifestationEnum

enum: 2 or more, at least 1 pathogically confirmed
NonvestibularSchwannomaManifestationEnum.title: NonvestibularSchwannomaManifestationEnum

OpticGliomaManifestationEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of optic gliomas, combining information on presence, symptoms, and treatment.
OpticGliomaManifestationEnum.title: OpticGliomaManifestationEnum

Percentiles-2SD.description: Enumerations corresponding to 3 bins using 2 standard deviations as a cutoff.
Percentiles-2SD.title: Percentiles-2SD

PlexiformNeurofibromaManifestationEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of plexiform neurofibromas, combining information on presence and the certainty via MRI imaging technique.
PlexiformNeurofibromaManifestationEnum.title: PlexiformNeurofibromaManifestationEnum

PresenceEnum.description: Enumeration for binary + unknown for very basic classification of a manifestation in clinical context.
PresenceEnum.title: PresenceEnum

SchwannomaManifestationEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of schwannomas.
SchwannomaManifestationEnum.title: SchwannomaManifestationEnum

SpinalNeuromaManifestationEnum.description: Enumerations describing the manifestation of spinal neurofibromas, combining information on presence and the cervical locations.
SpinalNeuromaManifestationEnum.title: SpinalNeuromaManifestationEnum
